channel.title: Comments on: Want to watch the Apple iPad 3 event live? Good luck!
channel.description: Tech news worth talking about and tech help worth listening to

item.title: By: Susie Rodriguez
item.dc:creator: Susie Rodriguez
item.description: Good post! This is the kind of information that should be distributed on the online community. I would like to read more of this.
